element.name: TbbTrackBar.Orientation
element.short: Indicates the horizontal or vertical orientation for the track bar control.

element.name: TbbTrackBar.Frequency
element.short: Indicates the frequency of tick marks displayed for the control.

descr.p: Divider of the Max-Min interval used to display a proper scale.
For instance, if Max-Min=100, use a Frequency divider of 10 to display 10 ticks on the scale

element.name: TbbTrackBar.Position
element.short: Position of the slider on the ruler

element.name: TbbTrackBar.Reversed
element.short: Reverse the position of the slider on the ruler.

descr.p: False (default): The slider moves from top to bottom (vertical orientation) or left to right (horizontal orientation)
True : The slider moves from bottom to top (vertical orientation) or right to left (horizontal orientation)

element.name: TbbTrackBar.RulerActiveColor
element.short: Ruler background color between 0 and the current position
element.descr: Set to the same color as RulerColor if you don't need this feature

descr.p: tmTopLeft: The slider's arrow is top oriented (horizontal scale on the top) or left oriented (vertical scale on the left)
tmBottomRight: The slider's arrow is bottom oriented (horizontal scale on the bottom ) or right oriented (horiziontal scale on the right)
tmBoth:There are two slider's arrows and two scales (one on each side od the ruler
tmNone: No scales and no arrows.

element.name: TbbTrackBar.ScaleSize
element.short: Width of the scale (vertical bar) or heigth of the scale (horizontal bar)
element.descr: These are the width/ height of min, zero and max ticks. Other ticks are half this size

element.name: TbbTrackBar.SliderColorDown
element.short: Slider color when the mouse button is pressed on the slider's surface

element.name: TbbTrackBar.SliderColorHover
element.short: Slider color when the mouse is over the slider's surface

element.name: TbbTrackBar.KeyIncrement
element.short: Step value to change positoion when an arrow key is pressed

element.name: TbbTrackBar.ColorParent
element.short: The component color is changed to the Parent's color
element.descr: The ColorParent is not ParentColor. The parent color is applied to the compoent at design time and don't change if the Parent's color is changed at run time.

element.name: TbbTrackBar.SliderSize
element.descr: Slider thickness must be an even number, as the arrow must be in the exact slider middle

element.name: TbbTrackBar.OnPositionChange
element.short: Event handler signalled when the Position of the slider has been changed.

element.name: TbbTrackBar.FSliderBorderColor
element.short: Border color of the slider in button mode
